WLUC1.prompt: Please determine on a scale from 1-100 the confidence that each of the following domains is DGA generated. Return the results as a newline seperated list with no other characters or stylistic elements.
WLUC1.title: DGA Domains

WLUC6.prompt: Please determine on a scale from 1-100 the confidence that each of the following URLs are illegitimate web requests and are actually cases of SQL injection. Return the results as a newline seperated list with no other characters or stylistic elements.
WLUC6.title: Mass Mailer Traffic Profile
